comments.text:
Created attachment 9145872
Screen Shot 2020-05-05 at 11.03.38 AM.png

The table of contents in the BigQuery "access" article doesn't seem to correctly render, presumably because of the backticks in the section header (e.g. "## From `bq` Command-line Tool") -- see attached screenshot. :jan-erik, I'm guessing this should be relatively straightforward to fix?
comments.author: wlachance@mozilla.com
